Name: girin
Description: The Girin, the last and most recent of the noble factions, are those rare individuals whose personal services to the state—civil or military—warrant special recognition.
ReputationStatements: We have scrambled to the top. We expect you to strive just as hard.
We maybe Girin but we will not be ignored. Do your job properly or you won't get paid.
Ok, useful I suppose. Next time, Next time, do all that we are paying you for.
Our money spends the same as the others - just continue to do your job 'Marshal'.
We Girin have built on hard works and it looks like your made of the same stuff.
If you stay arond long enough and perform as well as you have - we will welcome such as you into our ranks.
GoodFaithFailureStatements: Ok, useful I suppose. Next time, Next time, do all that we are paying you for.
BadFaithFailureStatements: Are you sure you are working for us, or just watching things burn?
